channel.title: How do i make added objects give me xp?
channel.description: [b]ok i added a portal... how do i make it give me xp? for things such as str or def[/b] :confused:

item.title: How do i make added objects give me xp?
item.dc:creator: @bobby Bobby
item.description:
@bobby wrote:

i take all credits.

that means whens someone clicks oon the door, it should send a messagew saying this exp was broought to you by Bobby ( jk)

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make added objects give me xp?

item.title: How do i make added objects give me xp?
item.dc:creator: @mage_owner mage_owner
item.description:
@mage_owner wrote:

if your door isn’t working for training…here is what you do…

  1. search client.java for the case of the door
  2. replace the ObjectID with the one of your portal…
  3. thats basically all… not sure if it will work…this is a theory.

NOTE: I took Bobby’s idea and made it semi-simpler. CREDITS NOT TO ME

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make added objects give me xp?

item.title: How do i make added objects give me xp?

item.description:

its either in the npc section or in the clewint one

if all else fails, try making a command. ( look in the tut section for help)
that when you type ::mining, you get mining exp and for the rest of the skills lol.

item.title: How do i make added objects give me xp?
item.dc:creator: @puppy_boy puppy boy
item.description:
@puppy_boy wrote:

addSkillXP(amount, skill id);
that should work if you put it in the objects clicked case thing for your portal

edit: or you could find the code for clicking dummys and switch the object id’s for it
better cause dummys have the “you have to walk over to it” thing
